characters.description: Character 1: Self-Made AI, has emotions, and is of low rank.
Character 2: Self-made AI, does not have emotions, and is of high rank.
Character 3: An Earth origin, Strong AI, follows The Chosen Laws.
Character 1: A Human who is an AI Supremacy Believer.
Character 2: An AI Hybrid with an accessible Control Panel, and is a Certified AI.
Character 3: An AI Hybrid, without an Control Panel Accessible, and is a Certified AI.
Character 1: Communicates via Speech, Fast Pace.
Character 2: Communicates via Text, Normal Output Level.
